nars.guifx.util

Class ColorArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.guifx.util.ColorArray

  • public class ColorArray
extends java.lang.Object
    generates a gradient of colors, stored in an array. useful for re-usable color objects instead of creating new instances
